page.title: 02WHY I LIKE ANSTEY.
page.content:
I like Anstey because where I live it is quiet and not many cars go along our road. I like Anstey because a fair comes every year. I like Anstey because the countryside is quiet and there is a lot of interesting history. I like Anstey because there is a lot of play area to play on. I like Anstey because it has some good shops. I like Anstey because I have a lot of friends. I like Anstey because of the people that live here. I like Anstey because there are many nice attractions. Anstey is a lovely place to be.
By Sarah Warrington. Aged 11.
